subject: Update the Java version and supporting libraries
description: As a developer I want to be able to build the project using recent development tools so that my tools are up-to-date

subject: Team maturity value
description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to provide a team maturity value to make the simulation better resemble the behavior of my actual team

subject: Step through simulation
description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to pause the simulation and step through each day so I can see the progress for each day

subject: Modify velocity value
description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to modify the velocity value to generate a simulation that more resembles that of my own team

subject: Add an ability to add teams
description: As a scrum developer, I would want to add new teams so that performance of newly made teams can be tracked.

subject: Integration with Taiga
description: As a Scrum developer, I want the Scrum Board Simulator to retrieve the values from Taiga so that we I can simulate a Sprint to try and predict the Sprint outcome

subject: Switch between burndown and burn-up charts
description: As a developer, I want to be able to switch between the views of the burndown and burn-up charts to track the actual work done in the sprint.

subject: Idealized burnup/down lines
description: As a developer, I want to see the idealized burn-up or burndown lines in the burn-up/down charts so that I can compare the actual work being done to how much work is to be done.

subject: Add more User Stories
description: As a scrum developer, I want to add more user stories in the simulation, to see how it can impact the  completion of the sprint and also the burn-up/burndown chart.

subject: Provide an ability to create new strategies
description: As an engineer, I want to provide an ability to create new strategies, so it can design strategies.

subject: Reset initial project conditions
description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to reset the initial project conditions so that I can rerun the simulation and observe the results

subject: Fix the end-day before start-day bug
description: As a Scrum developer I want the simulation software to be free of bugs so that I can use it reliably

subject: Calculate Performance using Area Under Burn Chart
Ability to switch Sound/ Music On/Off
Add a Button to Pause simulation
